strengths: Consistent use of Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components
Good dark mode support throughout admin panel
Proper form validation with Zod schemas
Loading states and skeleton screens implemented
key_concerns: Critical accessibility gaps - minimal ARIA labels and keyboard navigation
Inconsistent error handling and user feedback patterns
Mobile responsiveness issues on complex tables
Missing focus management in modals and dialogs
No breadcrumb navigation except in layout
Limited help text and tooltips for complex features

issues.title: Missing ARIA labels on interactive elements
issues.description: Throughout the admin panel, buttons, links, and form controls lack descriptive ARIA labels. Only 1 occurrence of aria-label found across all admin pages.
issues.impact: Screen reader users cannot understand the purpose of interactive elements. Fails WCAG 2.1 Level A compliance.
issues.recommendation: Add aria-label or aria-labelledby to all interactive elements, especially icon-only buttons and navigation items.

issues.title: No keyboard navigation support
issues.description: Zero keyboard event handlers (@keydown, @keyup, @keypress) found in admin pages. Users cannot navigate using keyboard alone.
issues.impact: Keyboard-only users cannot efficiently navigate tables, filters, or perform actions. Fails WCAG 2.1 Level A.
issues.recommendation: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions (e.g., Cmd+K for search, arrow keys for table navigation, Enter to select, Escape to close modals).

issues.title: Modal focus trap not implemented
issues.description: Modals (user detail modal, delete confirmation) don't trap focus or return focus to trigger element on close.
issues.impact: Keyboard users can tab out of modals into background content. Screen readers lose context.
issues.recommendation: Implement focus trap using useFocusTrap or similar composable. Auto-focus first interactive element on modal open.

issues.title: Checkbox lacks accessible labels
issues.description: Bulk selection checkboxes in tables use native HTML checkbox without proper label association.
issues.impact: Screen readers announce 'checkbox' without context about what is being selected.
issues.recommendation: Wrap checkboxes in label elements or use aria-label with descriptive text like 'Select order #12345'.

issues.title: Sortable table headers lack ARIA sort indicators
issues.description: Sortable column headers show visual sort indicator but don't expose sort state to screen readers.
issues.impact: Screen reader users don't know which column is sorted or in which direction.
issues.recommendation: Add aria-sort='ascending|descending|none' to table headers based on current sort state.

issues.title: Live region announcements missing
issues.description: Dynamic content updates (filters applied, bulk operations completed) don't announce changes to screen readers.
issues.impact: Screen reader users miss important status updates and result changes.
issues.recommendation: Add aria-live regions for dynamic content updates with appropriate politeness settings.

issues.title: Color-only status indicators
issues.description: Order status badges and stock indicators rely solely on color without text or icons for users with color blindness.
issues.impact: Users with color vision deficiency cannot distinguish between statuses.
issues.recommendation: Add text labels or icons alongside color indicators. Ensure color contrast meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1).

issues.title: Form error announcements missing
issues.description: Form validation errors appear visually but aren't announced to screen readers in real-time.
issues.impact: Screen reader users may submit invalid forms without knowing about errors.
issues.recommendation: Add aria-invalid and aria-describedby to form fields with errors. Use aria-live for error summary.

issues.title: Tab navigation lacks role and aria-selected
issues.description: Custom tab navigation doesn't use proper ARIA tablist pattern.
issues.impact: Screen readers don't recognize tab pattern. Users can't navigate with arrow keys.
issues.recommendation: Implement ARIA tablist pattern with role='tablist', role='tab', aria-selected, and arrow key navigation.

issues.title: Indeterminate checkbox state not announced
issues.description: Bulk selection 'select all' checkbox uses indeterminate state visually but doesn't expose to assistive tech.
issues.impact: Screen readers can't distinguish between checked, unchecked, and partially selected states.
issues.recommendation: Use aria-checked='mixed' when checkbox is in indeterminate state.

issues.title: Loading states lack accessible announcements
issues.description: Loading spinners are purely visual without aria-live announcements or role='status'.
files_affected: All admin pages with loading states
issues.impact: Screen reader users don't know when content is loading or has finished loading.
issues.recommendation: Add aria-live='polite' and visually hidden text 'Loading...' for screen readers.

issues.title: Skip navigation link missing
issues.description: Admin layout doesn't provide skip link to jump to main content, forcing keyboard users to tab through navigation.
issues.impact: Keyboard users must tab through all navigation items on every page load.
issues.recommendation: Add visually hidden skip link at top of layout that becomes visible on focus.

issues.title: Landmark regions not properly defined
issues.description: Layout doesn't use semantic HTML5 landmarks (nav, main, aside) or ARIA landmark roles.
issues.impact: Screen reader users can't quickly navigate to major page sections.
issues.recommendation: Replace divs with semantic elements: <nav> for sidebar, <main> for content area.

issues.title: Heading hierarchy issues
issues.description: Some pages skip heading levels (h1 to h3) or have multiple h1 elements.
issues.impact: Screen reader users relying on heading navigation may miss content structure.
issues.recommendation: Ensure proper heading hierarchy: single h1 per page, no skipped levels.

issues.title: Link purpose not clear from text alone
issues.description: Some links use generic text like 'View' without context.
issues.impact: Screen reader users navigating by links don't understand destination.
issues.recommendation: Use descriptive link text or add aria-label for context: 'View order #12345'.

issues.title: Inconsistent navigation state management
issues.description: Sidebar active state detection uses custom logic per nav item instead of unified route matching. Different matching patterns across items.
issues.impact: Navigation highlighting may fail for nested routes, confusing users about current location.
issues.recommendation: Use NuxtLink's automatic active class detection or create a centralized navigation config with consistent route patterns.

issues.title: No breadcrumb navigation on detail pages
issues.description: Order detail, product detail, and user detail pages lack breadcrumbs showing navigation path.
issues.impact: Users lose context of where they are in the hierarchy. Hard to navigate back to parent pages.
issues.recommendation: Implement breadcrumb component showing: Admin > Orders > Order #12345

issues.title: Sidebar not responsive on tablet sizes
issues.description: Sidebar toggles at lg breakpoint, but tablet users (768px-1024px) get awkward hamburger menu.
issues.impact: Suboptimal experience on iPad and tablets - valuable screen space wasted.
issues.recommendation: Consider keeping sidebar visible on tablet landscape (md breakpoint), only hiding on mobile portrait.

issues.title: Mobile navigation overlay lacks close button
issues.description: Sidebar on mobile only closes when clicking outside overlay, not obvious to users.
issues.impact: Users may not realize they can close sidebar, leading to confusion.
issues.recommendation: Add visible X button in sidebar header on mobile viewports.

issues.title: No visual indication of unsaved changes
issues.description: Product form and email template editor track hasChanges but don't warn when navigating away.
issues.impact: Users can accidentally lose work by clicking navigation links.
issues.recommendation: Implement beforeRouteLeave guard to confirm navigation when hasChanges is true.

issues.title: Inconsistent page title format
issues.description: Some pages use 'Product Management' while others use 'Products - Admin - Moldova Direct' format.
issues.impact: Browser tabs and bookmarks have inconsistent, confusing titles.
issues.recommendation: Standardize to: 'Page Name - Admin - Moldova Direct' format across all pages.

issues.title: Sidebar navigation lacks grouping
issues.description: All navigation items in flat list without logical grouping (e.g., Sales, Content, System).
issues.impact: As nav grows, finding items becomes harder. No visual hierarchy.
issues.recommendation: Group navigation items with section headers: Orders & Products, Users & Analytics, System & Tools.

issues.title: Current page name in breadcrumb uses translation key
issues.description: Breadcrumb shows translated label but doesn't update if user changes language without page reload.
issues.impact: Language switching may show mixed language breadcrumbs.
issues.recommendation: Ensure breadcrumb reactively updates with i18n locale changes.

issues.title: No search in navigation
issues.description: No global search or command palette to quickly jump to orders, products, or users.
issues.impact: Users must manually navigate through pages to find specific items.
issues.recommendation: Implement Cmd+K command palette for quick search and navigation.

issues.title: Form submission without loading state on some forms
issues.description: Email template editor save button shows 'Saving...' text but button remains enabled, allowing double submissions.
issues.impact: Users may accidentally submit form multiple times, creating duplicate actions.
issues.recommendation: Disable button during submission: :disabled='saving || !hasChanges'

issues.title: Validation errors not focused after submission
issues.description: When form validation fails, first error field is not automatically focused for correction.
issues.impact: Users must manually scroll to find errors, especially on long forms.
issues.recommendation: Auto-focus first field with error and scroll into view after validation fails.

issues.title: No inline validation on blur
issues.description: Form fields only validate on submit, not as user fills them out.
issues.impact: Users only discover errors after attempting submission, frustrating experience.
issues.recommendation: Add @blur event handlers to validate individual fields as user completes them.

issues.title: Required field indicators inconsistent
issues.description: Some required fields marked with asterisk in label, others aren't. No consistent pattern.
issues.impact: Users can't tell which fields are required before attempting submission.
issues.recommendation: Add red asterisk to all required field labels. Add '(Required)' text for screen readers.

issues.title: No character count for limited fields
issues.description: Fields with length limits (e.g., product description) don't show character count.
issues.impact: Users don't know how close they are to limits, may exceed and get validation error.
issues.recommendation: Add character counter below textarea fields: '250 / 500 characters'

issues.title: Error messages lack actionable guidance
issues.description: Zod validation errors show generic messages like 'Price must be greater than 0' without suggesting fix.
issues.impact: Users see what's wrong but not how to fix it.
issues.recommendation: Enhance error messages: 'Price must be greater than 0. Please enter a valid price like 9.99'

issues.title: Multi-language form fields lack language indicator
issues.description: Product name and description inputs for different locales only show small text label, easy to miss.
issues.impact: Users may fill wrong language field, especially if working quickly.
issues.recommendation: Add prominent language flag icons and color-coded borders to each locale field.

issues.title: No success confirmation after save
issues.description: Some forms show toast notification, others just silently save without user feedback.
issues.impact: Users uncertain if changes were saved, may re-submit unnecessarily.
issues.recommendation: Always show success toast and optionally auto-redirect to list page.

issues.title: Date picker inputs use text input without calendar
issues.description: Date range filters require manual typing instead of providing date picker.
issues.impact: Harder to select dates, users must know exact format.
issues.recommendation: Integrate date picker library (e.g., VueDatePicker) for better UX.

issues.title: No responsive table design for mobile
issues.description: Admin tables use horizontal scroll on mobile instead of responsive card layout. Poor mobile UX.
issues.impact: Mobile admin users must scroll horizontally to see all columns, very difficult to use.
issues.recommendation: Implement responsive card layout for mobile: stack table data in cards with labels.

issues.title: No column visibility toggle
issues.description: Users can't hide/show columns based on their needs. All columns always visible.
issues.impact: Power users on smaller screens can't optimize table for their workflow.
issues.recommendation: Add column visibility dropdown to show/hide columns dynamically.

issues.title: Pagination doesn't show total pages
issues.description: Pagination shows 'Page 1' but doesn't indicate how many total pages exist.
issues.impact: Users don't know scope of data or how far they can navigate.
issues.recommendation: Display 'Page 1 of 25' or add page number input to jump to specific page.

issues.title: No row actions keyboard shortcuts
issues.description: Table row actions (edit, delete, view) only accessible via mouse clicks.
issues.impact: Keyboard users must tab through entire table to reach action buttons.
issues.recommendation: Add keyboard shortcuts: pressing 'e' on focused row opens edit, 'd' for delete, etc.

issues.title: No density options for table rows
issues.description: Table row height is fixed, users can't adjust for comfortable/compact view.
issues.impact: Some users prefer seeing more rows on screen, others need larger targets.
issues.recommendation: Add density toggle: Comfortable / Compact / Spacious row heights.

issues.title: Loading skeleton doesn't match table structure
issues.description: Skeleton loader shows generic rectangles, not actual table structure with columns.
issues.impact: Layout shift when content loads, jarring visual experience.
issues.recommendation: Create skeleton that matches exact table structure with proper column widths.

issues.title: No export functionality
issues.description: Users cannot export table data to CSV or Excel for external analysis.
issues.impact: Users must manually copy data or take screenshots for reporting.
issues.recommendation: Add 'Export to CSV' button that respects current filters and sorting.

issues.title: No saved filter presets
issues.description: Users must re-apply commonly used filter combinations on every visit.
issues.impact: Repetitive work for users who frequently use same filter sets.
issues.recommendation: Add 'Save current filters' feature to create named presets.

issues.title: Status tabs break on small mobile screens
issues.description: Order status tabs use grid-cols-5 which creates very narrow tabs on mobile (< 375px).
issues.impact: Text truncates or wraps awkwardly on small phones like iPhone SE.
issues.recommendation: Use horizontal scroll for tabs on mobile or stack vertically.

issues.title: Filter grid doesn't stack properly on mobile
issues.description: Product filters use grid-cols-4 which becomes cramped on mobile instead of stacking.
issues.impact: Filter dropdowns too narrow to read options clearly on mobile.
issues.recommendation: Use grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 for progressive enhancement.

issues.title: Page header stats overflow on tablet
issues.description: Order page header with revenue/avg order value stats breaks layout on 768px-1024px.
issues.impact: Stats text overlaps on iPad portrait, harder to read.
issues.recommendation: Stack stats vertically on tablet or hide until larger breakpoint.

issues.title: Analytics charts not optimized for mobile
issues.description: Chart components don't adjust aspect ratio or font sizes for mobile screens.
issues.impact: Charts are hard to read on mobile, axis labels may overlap.
issues.recommendation: Implement responsive chart options with smaller fonts and adjusted aspect ratios for mobile.

issues.title: Inconsistent button variants
issues.description: Some pages use outline variant for secondary actions, others use ghost. No clear pattern.
issues.impact: Inconsistent visual hierarchy confuses users about button importance.
issues.recommendation: Establish button variant hierarchy: primary for main actions, outline for secondary, ghost for tertiary.

issues.title: Card border radius inconsistency
issues.description: Some cards use rounded-lg, others use rounded-2xl without clear reason.
issues.impact: Visual inconsistency reduces professional appearance.
issues.recommendation: Standardize to single border radius value for all cards (suggest rounded-lg).

issues.title: Spacing scale not consistently applied
issues.description: Mix of space-y-6, space-y-4, space-y-8 without consistent semantic meaning.
issues.impact: Slight visual inconsistency in vertical rhythm.
issues.recommendation: Define semantic spacing scale: xs=2, sm=4, md=6, lg=8 and use consistently.

issues.title: No debouncing on search inputs
issues.description: Search filter triggers API call on every keystroke instead of debouncing.
issues.impact: Excessive API calls slow down search, potential rate limiting issues.
issues.recommendation: Good - 300ms debounce is implemented. This is actually well done.

issues.title: Dashboard delegates to component without own structure
issues.description: Page is just a wrapper for AdminDashboardOverview component, doesn't add any page-level context.
issues.impact: Makes component tightly coupled to page, harder to reuse.
issues.recommendation: Add page-level layout and structure, pass data as props to component.

issues.title: Bulk operations progress bar blocks entire screen
issues.description: Bulk operations bar appears on top but doesn't prevent interaction with underlying table during operation.
issues.impact: Users might accidentally trigger new operations while previous one is running.
issues.recommendation: Add overlay or disable table interactions during bulk operations.

issues.title: Stock edit modal uses raw div overlay instead of Dialog component
issues.description: Custom modal implementation (lines 73-107) instead of using shadcn/ui Dialog.
issues.impact: Inconsistent modal behavior, missing accessibility features of Dialog component.
issues.recommendation: Replace custom modal with Dialog component for consistency and a11y.

issues.title: User detail modal shows scroll issues on mobile
issues.description: Modal with max-h-[90vh] and overflow-y-auto may have touch scrolling issues on iOS.
issues.impact: Users may struggle to scroll through long user details on mobile devices.
issues.recommendation: Test on iOS and add -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch if needed.

issues.title: Action loading overlay is generic
issues.description: Loading overlay says 'Processing action...' without specifying which action.
issues.impact: Users don't know what's happening during action execution.
issues.recommendation: Show specific action: 'Suspending user...' or 'Resetting password...'

issues.title: Charts load all data on mount without pagination
issues.description: All three analytics endpoints called in parallel on mount, potentially large payloads.
issues.impact: Slow initial page load with large datasets, especially on slower connections.
issues.recommendation: Implement data pagination or limit initial data range to last 30 days.

issues.title: JSON textarea for template editing is not user-friendly
issues.description: Users must manually edit JSON in textarea, error-prone and difficult.
issues.impact: High risk of JSON syntax errors, poor UX for non-technical users.
issues.recommendation: Implement visual form builder or at minimum add JSON validation with syntax highlighting.

issues.title: Preview uses iframe with sandbox but limited styling
issues.description: Email preview may not accurately show how email renders in actual email clients.
issues.impact: Users may be surprised by rendering differences in production emails.
issues.recommendation: Add warning that preview is approximate, consider integration with email testing service.

well_implemented_features.description: Excellent implementation of bulk operations with progress bar, error handling, and retry functionality.
Well-implemented real-time order updates using composable with subscription management.
Robust form validation using Zod schemas with proper error handling and display.
Proper implementation of search debouncing to prevent excessive API calls.
Comprehensive dark mode support with dark: variants throughout the application.
well_implemented_features.location: All pages (156 occurrences of dark: classes)

well_implemented_features.description: Consistent loading states with skeleton screens and spinners.
Well-designed empty states with helpful messaging and clear actions.
Comprehensive filtering with active filter badges and clear all functionality.
